content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Stone Furnace Facility at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position: 0.0, 0.0) – Smelts iron ore into iron plates; recently used to produce additional iron plates.
- Iron Chest (position: 1.5, 0.5) – Stores produced iron plates.

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (-16.0, -51.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position: -16.0, -51.0) – Extracts iron ore (currently reporting out of fuel).
- Burner Inserter (position: -14.5, -49.5) – Transfers ore from the extraction point.
- Transport Belt (position: -15.5, -49.5) – Delivers extracted ore.
- Iron Chest (position: -13.5, -49.5) – Stores ore delivered via the belt.
- Intermediate Transport Belt (position: -15.5, -47.5) – Feeds ore to a remote branch.
- Burner Inserter (position: -14.5, -47.5) – Moves ore along the intermediate belt.
- Remote Output Chest (position: -13.5, -47.5) – Receives ore from the remote inserter.

### Copper Furnace at position (-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position: -27.0, -60.0) – Smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Lab Power Integration System at position (0.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position: 0.5, 2.5) – Processes science packs.
- Offshore Pump (position: -7.5, 25.5) – Draws water from the resource.
- Boiler (position: 2.0, 17.5) – Converts water into steam; currently reporting NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel” after recent connection attempts.
- Steam Engine (position: 5.5, 5.5) – Generates electricity; remains NOT_CONNECTED with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”]. Segmented connection attempts (Steps 192 and 199) were executed with partial success and subsequent failures.

### Pipe Production Facility at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine (position: 3.5, 0.5) – Configured for pipe crafting; issues include missing iron-plate sub-ingredients and lack of electrical power.
- Iron Chest (position: 1.5, 0.5) – Stores crafted pipes.
- Electricity Network: Small Electric Poles located at (2.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (4.5, 3.5), (6.5, 0.5), (5.5, 0.5), (3.5, -2.5) and (3.5, -1.5); note that an attempted pole placement at (4.5, 0.5) failed due to an obstruction.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
• Steam Connection Pipeline Errors
 - Verify that the available pipe inventory meets the requirements of each connection segment before initiating a steam link.
 - For segmented steam connections, ensure that all intermediate waypoints are free of obstructions and correctly aligned; reposition or clear blockages as needed.

• Pipe Crafting and Resource Processing Errors
 - Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (in this case, iron plates) are available prior to crafting pipes, noting that iron plates must be produced via furnace smelting rather than being craftable directly.

• Boiler Fuel Management
 - Continuously monitor and replenish boiler fuel to prevent NO_FUEL status during connection operations.

• General Connection and Placement Issues
 - Confirm that the intended connection points are clear and within permissible placement distance.
 - Prior to laying pipeline segments or establishing network links, verify that no other entities obstruct the connection path.
